incident_updates.body: Start time: 31/05/2022 08:00 UTC User impact : While updating the Veeam license, customers could see a message that it is expired since 31th May, but we still have a 60 days extension. The service will work as usual and there is no impact on the customers infrastructure. Technical impact (DC/geographical area): all Scope of impact : Veeam Ongoing actions : Updating the license on our side
Start time : 09/06/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 09/06/2022 23:59 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: We need to upgrade all SDAGG Bart in order to have a homogeneous park.

Start time : 09/06/2022 10:00 UTC End time : 09/06/2022 11:30 UTC Service impact : Customers may experience a downtime of a 1 hour and 30 minutes Service improvement : The purpose of this operation is to perform a replacement on a deteriorating equipment.

Start time : 09/06/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 09/06/2022 23:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: In regards to our lifecycle management ,we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

Start time : 09/06/2022 23:00 UTC End time : 10/06/2022 00:00 UTC Service impact : A temporary interruption during this intervention will be observed on some services. Service improvement : The purpose of this maintenance is to strengthen the security of this equipment.

[RBX3-RBX6][Network] - Replacement of a Network device Start time : 14/06/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 14/06/2022 22:59 UTC Service impact : Networks won't be reachable for about 3 minutes at one time during the maintenance. Service improvement: This maintenance will serve the objective to standardize our network infrastructure.

Start time : 15/06/2022 12:00 UTC End time : 15/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : No downtime expected in term of log ingestion, but ES API will not be available for a maximum time of two hours. Service improvement: The indexation backend of Logs Data Platform will be replaced from Elasticsearch to OpenSearch. Kibana instances will be replaced by OpenSearch Dashboards ones. APIv6 calls related to ElasticSearch backend will be automatically redirected to new OpenSearch backend and will remain available until September 2022. The following documentation : https://docs.ovh.com/fr/logs-data-platform/ will be updated few days before the migration.

affected_components.name: Managed Services || Logs Data Platform - GRA
Managed Services || Logs Data Platform - BHS

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.
